summary:
Experienced and independent all-round consultant with a demonstrated (business and non-business related) history of working in the following targeted countries: Serbia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Montenegro and Croatia.
My prospective clients encompass Dutch companies, (profit and non-profit) organizations and institutions working in or with the targeted countries.
Available services:

•	Sharing working related network, experience, knowledge and expertise with prospective clients with an interest in the targeted countries
•	Introducing Dutch partners to most relevant local network and experts in the targeted countries
•	Maintain permanent contacts and business opportunities with potential local partners in the targeted countries
•	Management and coordination of projects and cooperation with potential local partners in the targeted countries
•	Assistance regarding possible establishment in targeted countries
•	Preparing and executing fact-finding missions and/or business and trade-related visits
•	Guiding delegations of prospective clients traveling to targeted countries (incl. translation and logistic services)
•	Promoting and representing interests of prospective clients
•	Translation services (Dutch, English into languages of the targeted countries and vice versa)

awards.title: Knight of the Order of Orange Nassau
Ridder in de Orde van Oranje-Nassau

company.name: PAX, Dutch peace organization (Nobel Peace Prize in 2017!)

profile_positions.company: PAX, Dutch peace organization (Nobel Peace Prize in 2017!)
profile_positions.description:
Key qualifications
IN GENERAL:
•	In-depth knowledge of the region of former Yugoslavia, the political and business culture, mentality of people and the cultural traditions
•	Very good experiences with working in a politically, business and culturally sensitive environment
•	Native speaker of the most important local languages (Serbian, Croatian, Bosnian, Montenegrin) 
•	Flexible, committed, efficient and open-minded
•	Very good people management skills, combining a-straight-forward with a diplomatic approach where needed
•	Very good mediation and business negotiations skills
•	Huge experience in organising seminars and trainings
•	Very good equipped to identify business partners and key actors and to create links between and with
•	Very good in organising of the working visits of Dutch municipalities, business subjects, NGO’s to their counterparts in former Yugoslavia and vice versa
•	Huge experience in organizing of the fact finding missions in former Yugoslavia
MORE SPECIFIC 
•	Studied political sciences in ex-Yugoslavia, international political relations and business schools in the Netherlands
•	Also technical and business background
•	Extensive experience in different projects and programmes, in Bosnia and Herzegovina, Serbia, Montenegro and Croatia since 1999
•	The person in charge of the selection and preparation of the  municipalities in Serbia, Croatia and Bosnia and Herzegovina for different projects with Dutch municipalities and NGO’s
•	Preparation and realisation of business trips of different Dutch companies to former Yugoslavia
•	A huge network of and very good contacts with government and local authorities, prominent NGO’s and important business subjects in former Yugoslavia, especially in Bosnia and Herzegovina, Serbia, Croatia and Montenegro
•	Excellent working relations and cooperation with Dutch embassies in former Yugoslavia, in particular Bosnia and Herzegovina
